channel.title: Domain renewal
channel.description:
If I renew an expiring domain a few months before it actually expires, does next years expiry month change to the month I renewed the domain in, or does it just add another years worth of 'credits' to the domain.
Like say I originally paid for this: September 2009 - September 2010
If I then renewed the domain in August, would the domain be valid until August 2011 or September 2011?

item.title: Domain renewal
item.dc:creator: @Barrage1 Denoria
item.description:
@Barrage1 wrote:

If you renew your domain early it will just go for the months you renewed it for earlier and then it will cover another year, and then you will pay it after.

Example: You paid it 3 months early.

Your domain will now last for 1 year and 3 months before the next invoice is sent.

Hope i helped.

Read full topic
